hnx.viz.draw_projections module#

hnx.viz.draw_projections.draw_bipartite(h: Hypergraph, pos=None, ax=None, align='vertical', **kwargs)[source]#

Draws a bipartite graph representation of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected. :param pos: :type pos: dict. A dictionary with nodes as keys and positions as values. :param ax: :type ax: matplotlib.axes.Axes. The axes to draw the graph on. :param kwargs: :type kwargs: dict. Keyword arguments to be passed to networkx.draw_networkx. :param align: :type align: str. The alignment of the nodes. Can be ‘vertical’ or ‘horizontal’.

Returns:

ax

Return type:

matplotlib.axes.Axes. The axes the graph was drawn on.

hnx.viz.draw_projections.draw_clique(h: Hypergraph, pos=None, ax=None, **kwargs)[source]#

Draws a clique projection of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected. :param pos: :type pos: dict. A dictionary with nodes as keys and positions as values. :param ax: :type ax: matplotlib.axes.Axes. The axes to draw the graph on. :param kwargs: :type kwargs: dict. Keyword arguments to be passed to networkx.draw_networkx.

Returns:

ax

Return type:

matplotlib.axes.Axes. The axes the graph was drawn on.
